title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit - the ultimate power tool set for all your DIY and professional needs. This kit includes 2 batteries and a charger, so you'll always have the power you need to get the job done.

The DCD771 Drill/Driver offers a powerful performance with a speed transmission that ranges from 0 to 1500 RPM. With a compact and lightweight design, this drill is easy to maneuver and won't weigh you down. The 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck makes changing bits a breeze, while the ergonomic handle ensures comfort and control during extended use.

The DCF885 Impact Driver is also compact and lightweight, measuring just 5.55 inches front to back. With a chuck size of 1/4-inch hex and 1-handed loading, this impact driver is perfect for tight spaces and quick bit changes. The LED light ring with 3 LEDs provides superior visibility, even in low-light conditions, and has a delay time of 20 seconds to eliminate shadows.

Both tools in this combo kit are designed with durability and efficiency in mind. The yellow and black color scheme is not only visually appealing but also a hallmark of DEWALT's trusted quality. The LED foot light adds an additional level of visibility, ensuring you never miss a detail.

With 2 included batteries and a charger, you'll always have a backup power source ready to go. Whether you're a professional contractor or a weekend warrior, the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit is a must-have addition to your toolbox. Don't miss out on this incredible deal - order yours today and experience the power of DEWALT.

Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit! This power tool combo kit is a must-have for any DIY enthusiast or professional contractor. With its sleek Yellow/Black design, this kit (DCK240C2) includes everything you need to tackle any project with ease.

The Drill/Driver (model DCD771) features a compact and lightweight design, making it comfortable to use for extended periods. It offers two speed settings, with a high speed of up to 1500 RPM, allowing you to power through any drilling task. With its 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck, you can easily change bits without any hassle. The ergonomic handle provides optimal comfort and control, ensuring precision in every application.

The Impact Driver (model DCF885) is also compact and lightweight, measuring only 5.55 inches front to back. Weighing just 2.8 lbs, it is incredibly portable and easy to maneuver. The 1/4-inch hex chuck allows for quick and convenient one-handed bit loading, saving you time and effort. It accepts 1-inch bit tips, providing versatility for various applications. Plus, the built-in LED light ring with three LEDs ensures superior visibility, even in low-light conditions. With a delay time of 20 seconds, you won't have to worry about shadows hindering your work.

The kit includes two 20V Lithium Ion batteries, ensuring that you always have a backup power source. The charger is also included, so you can recharge your batteries quickly and efficiently. No more waiting around for hours!

One standout feature of this combo kit is the LED foot light, which provides superior visibility to illuminate your work area. Say goodbye to shadows and hello to precise and accurate results.

With its wide range of applications, this DEWALT Combo Kit is perfect for various projects, from simple household repairs to professional construction work. The package contents include the DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, the DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, two 20V Lithium Ion Batteries, and a Charger.

Don't miss out on this incredible deal! Get your DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit today and experience the power and performance that DEWALT is known for.
